concept.title: MapR Prerequisites
concept.shortdesc: Due to licensing restrictions, StreamSets cannot distribute MapR libraries with . As a result, you must perform additional steps to enable the machine to connect to MapR.

conbody.p: MapRprerequisitesMapR prerequisites include installing the required client libraries and then running the command to set up MapR.

p.note: The MapR FS destination supports MapR versions 5.0.0, 5.1.0 and 5.2.0. All other stages that use the MapR library currently only support MapR versions 5.1.0 and 5.2.0.
